basics.name: Mantri Aditya

basics.summary: I am a Masters Graduate with M.S. in Data Science for Computer Science in the Department of Engineering and Applied Sciences at the University of Buffalo

work.summary: Created, analyzed and reported data based research and findings in AI tools surveys
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official department website and database
Drive, design and build student-community survey projects for University at Buffalo
Train, build and deploy LLms from Hugging face models for summary generation and text classification tasks.
Troubleshoot software and web content publishing issues over the phone
Extensively worked with Microsoft tools, JIRA, LaTeX, and Java programming to provide mentorship and guidance for undergraduate students in computer science.

volunteer.summary: Develoeped data based solution to analyze patterns and extraxt statistical inferences from earthquake data. Recieved certificate award of 4th position for insightful data analysis.
